Author: bir_die
Text: It takes about 2 hours for your body to fully intake most birth controls and other medications. So if you purge within that time period, yeah you’ll have to take another one.

Author: Starkambience
Text: I had this problem bad when I was on the pills bc I b/p so much , that’s literally the ONLY reason why I got on Nexplanon ( Arm implant ) because I would be scared about taking two pills each day or technically missing a dose
